examples.input:
On the table, you see a set of objects arranged in a row: a green scrunchiephone charger, a red cup, a silver cat toy, a grey paperclip, and a fuchsia sheet of paper. What is the color of the object furthest from the cup?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink

On the floor, you see a purple bracelet and a red scrunchiephone charger. How many things are neither red nor purple?
Options:
(A) zero
(B) one
(C) two
(D) three
(E) four
(F) five
(G) six

On the table, you see the following objects arranged in a row: a brown jug, a blue notebook, and a purple paperclip. What is the color of the object furthest from the purple object?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink

On the table, I see a yellow envelope, a gold stress ball, a magenta booklet, a blue bracelet, a mauve necklace, and a teal mug. What color is the envelope?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink

On the desk, you see two teal puzzles, two red puzzles, three grey jugs, two teal plates, two blue puzzles, three red jugs, two blue jugs, and two grey plates. If I remove all the blue items from the desk, how many puzzles remain on it?
Options:
(A) zero
(B) one
(C) two
(D) three
(E) four
(F) five
(G) six
(H) seven
(I) eight
(J) nine
(K) ten
(L) eleven
(M) twelve
(N) thirteen
(O) fourteen
(P) fifteen
(Q) sixteen
